subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghostly image in the news
author: Ron Lederer
full_text:
--0-967400116-1208386027=:84402
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

C2C Stream Link has about 10 images of what looks like Christ on a window reflection inside the hospital.  Many photos, videos, celphone photos were taken of the image that remainded for about one hour so you should be seeing alot of this on the media.  Ron L

Aaron <a.cronk@...> wrote:          I heard that story last night on the radio. I looked it up this morning too, and the images are pretty nice.    
  -Aaron
   
  On Wed, Apr 16, 2008 at 6:20 PM, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
              I saw a short clip of this the other day but I never watch the news so I missed the complete story. I ran across it again today one the c2c site so I checked out the local news site to see if they had the photo. They had quite a few of them on there. I can see why some were quick to decide who/what they were seeing considering the atmosphere. I know it well my mother was a frequent visitor there. As for me, not so quick to presume but I did enjoy the imagery and thier ability to capture it! Check it out.
   
  Image In Hospital Brings Some To Tears, Prompts E-Mails
  Hospital Calls It An Unexplained Image  http://www.local6.com/news/15875360/detail.html
   
  Misty
    
---------------------------------
  Be a better friend, newshound, and know-it-all with Yahoo! Mobile. Try it now.
